update crude_oil_long_term_contract set initiator = #{initiator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trader = #{trader,jdbcType=BIGINT}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contract_type = #{contractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num_float = #{numFloat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference_id = #{referenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, valuation_formula_json = #{valuationFormulaJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valuation_formula = #{valuationFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_item = #{tradeItem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agio = #{agio,jdbcType=BIGINT}, valuation_base = #{valuationBase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valuation_proid = #{valuationProid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_item = #{payItem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, purchase_mode = #{purchaseMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, num = #{num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meter_num = #{meterNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, meter_unit = #{meterUnit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, buyer = #{buyer,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seller = #{seller,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, double_sign = #{doubleSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT col.id id ,cor.name name, ss.sum sum,col.trade_item trade_item,col.pay_time pay_time,col.double_sign double_sign,col.uuid uuid FROM crude_oil_long_term_contract col LEFT JOIN crude_oil_resource cor ON col.resource_id = cor.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract_id, SUM(num) sum FROM crude_oil_long_term_contract_plan GROUP BY contract_id ) ss ON col.id = ss.contract_id WHERE 1=1
AND col.id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
